642919.title: Amazing House group location 25min from Amsterdam
642919.description: About this space Grouplocation 6-14 persons Renovated authentic large country house 1907 in Amsterdam Lake district Loosdrecht. Surrounded by beautiful lakes, woods, countryside. Close to city life 30 min from Amsterdam center and airport.Trainstation 10 min, taxi and Uber, busstop in front of house,2 shopping centers 5 min by car, market 10 min.Dedicated workspace A room with wifi that’s well-suited for working. Murielle is a Superhost Superhosts are experienced, highly rated hosts who are committed to providing great stays for guests. Free cancellation before Aug 15.
642919.bedroom: Bedroom 1 1 double bed, 2 single beds Bedroom 2 2 single beds Bedroom 3 2 single beds Bedroom 4 2 single beds
642919.location: Loosdrecht, North Holland, Netherlands Terraces and restaurants on the water on our street. The 1st restaurant is by foot 3 min. You can rent variety of boots for a trip on the lakes. Woods and heather fields for walking are nearby (5 min). Bike rent. Our neighbors run a farm, with a foodshop They are closed on Sundays. Getting around Car, Uber, taxi, train, bus, bike
642919.rules:
house rules
you'll be staying in someone's home, so please treat it with care and respect.
checking in and out
check-in: 3:00 PM - 12:00 AM
checkout before 11:00 AM
during your stay
14 guests maximum
no pets
no parties or events
no smoking

642919.Safety & property: Avoid surprises by looking over these important details about your Host's property. Safety devices: Carbon monoxide alarm installed Smoke alarm installed

amenities.Essentials: Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper, hangers, bed linens, iron
amenities.Family: Crib, pack ’n play/Travel crib, high chair
amenities.Home safety: Smoke alarm, carbon monoxide alarm, fire extinguisher, first aid kit
amenities.Internet and office: Wifi, dedicated workspace, in a room with a door, pocket wifi
amenities.Kitchen and dining: Kitchen, refrigerator, microwave, cooking basics, dishes and silverware, dishwasher, stove, oven, coffee maker
amenities.Location features: Beach access, private entrance, resort access
amenities.Outdoor: Private patio or balcony, private backyard – Fully fenced, outdoor furniture, outdoor dining area, BBQ grill
